name: Dimension (itch) (Entite14)
description:
Dimension is a game in development, it is at the very beginning, so sorry if it is empty but I want opinions on the game in general ... well there is only the map to judge for the moment, the map is infinite and it generates itself to the infinity too!

What I would like the game to become:

I would like my game to become a game like the famous minecraft game but more complete like going to space or other

If you download my game, thank you very much because it's the only support you can give me!
